title: Whispers in the Archives
goal: Kaelen seeks ancient knowledge, finding clues to a forgotten era and his own past.

beats.summary: Kaelen arrives at a renowned library or archive, hoping to find records of his era or the ancient Blight.
He struggles with the modern cataloging systems but eventually finds obscure texts hinting at a 'Great Silence' or 'Lost Age' that aligns with his memories.
He deciphers fragments describing an ancient entity or force that was sealed away, but the details are vague and contradictory.
